column2: "Na iyi ekyir no
column3: Ewuradze yii eduosuon  afofor so
column4: na ɔsomaa hɔn beenu beenu dzii n’enyim kan kɔr kurow anaa beebiara a nankasa robɔkɔ hɔ no mu."
column5: "#10.1 Tsetse akyerɛwfo binom ka dɛ eduosuon ebien."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Otwadwuma no dɔɔ so ampa
column5: wosuar: dɛm ntsi hom nserɛ otwadwuma no wura ma ɔnsoma edwumayɛfo mbra no twadwuma no mu."

column2: "Hom nkɔ: hwɛ
column3: mosoma hom dɛ nguambaa wɔ mpataku finimfin."

column2: "Mma hom mmfa sika kotoku
column3: anaa bɔtɔ
column4: anaa nsokota; na mma hom nnkyia obi wɔ kwan mu."

column2: "Na ofi biara a hom bɛhɛn mu no
column3: hom ndzi kan nse dɛ

column2: "Na sɛ asomdwee ba wɔ hɔ a
column3: hom asomdwee bɛtsena no do

column2: "Na fie hɔ ara na hom ntsena
column3: na hom ndzi na hom nnom dza wɔbɛma: osiandɛ odwumayɛfo n’apaadze sɛ no: mma hom mmfi fie kor mu nnkɔ fofor mu."

column2: "Na kurow biara a hom kɔ mu
column3: na wɔgye hom
column4: hom ndzi dza wɔdze besi hom enyim;"

column2: "na hom nsa no mu ayarfo yarba
column3: na hom nse hɔn dɛ

column2: "Na kurow biara a hom kɔ mu na wɔnngye hom no
column3: hom mfir nkɔ n’abɔntsen do

column2: "Hom kurow mu huntuma a ayeyɛ hɛn ho mpo yɛprapra gu hom do: na ɔyɛ dɛn ara a
column3: hom nhu iyi dɛ Nyankopɔn ahenman no abɛn hom."

column2: "Na mese hom dɛ ɔbɛfanyim Sodom wɔ da no mu akyɛn dɛm kurow no."
"Korazin ndue! Bɛtsaeda ndue! Osiandɛ sɛ tum ndwuma a wɔyɛe wɔ hom mu yi
column3: wɔyɛɛ no wɔ Taere nye Sidon mu a
column4: nkyɛ wɔtsenatsenaa eyitam nye nso mu nuu hɔnho ntsɛmara."

column2: "Na ɔbɛfanyim Taere nye Sidon wɔ atsɛmbu no mu akyɛn hom."

column3: Karpernaum

column2: "Na eduosuon no dze dɛw sanee bɛsee dɛ

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
column3: Muhun Satan dɛ ofir sor rohwe ase dɛ enyinam."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: mama hom tum dɛ hom ntsiatsia nwɔ nye nyankoma nketsebowa do nye ɔtamfo ahoɔdzen nyina do: na biribiara runntum nnyɛ hom."

column2: "Naaso mma hom nndzi dɛw wɔ iyi mu dɛ esunsum fi abrɛ hɔnho adze ama hom
column3: na mbom hom ndzi dɛw dɛ wɔakyerɛw hom edzin wɔ sor."

column2: "Na dɔn no ara mu odzii ehurusi wɔ Sunsum Krɔnkrɔn mu
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column7: dɛ edze ndzɛmba yi esuma enyansafo nye abadwembafo

column2: "Ndzɛmba nyina m’Egya dze ahyɛ me nsa; na obi nnyim mbrɛ Ɔba no tse
column3: gyedɛ Egya no; na obi nnyim mbrɛ Egya no tse
column4: gyedɛ Ɔba no na nyia Ɔba no pɛ dɛ oyi no kyerɛ no."

column2: "Na ɔdaan noho kyerɛɛ n’esuafo no see hɔn nko dɛ

column2: "Na hwɛ

column2: "Na Jesus bisaa no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na wɔakyerɛw no mbra no mu? Ekenkan dɛn?"

column2: "Na obuae see dɛ

column2: "Dɛmara na Levinyi bi so odur hɔ no
column3: ɔbae na obohunii na osii afa noho twaa mu."

column2: "Na Samarianyi bi a ɔnam no kwan baa mbrɛ ɔwɔ no
column3: na obohun no no

column2: "Na adzekyee no oyii sika denare ebien dze maa ahɔhodan wura no

column2: "Afei hɔn baasa yi mu woana na ɔyɛɛ nyia ɔkɔtɔɔ edwotwafo mu no ne nyɛnko?"
"Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Nyia ohun no mbɔbɔr no a. Na Jesus see no dɛ
column4: Kɔ na wo so kɛyɛ dɛmara."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ wɔrokɔ no
column3: wokodur ekuroba bi mu
column4: na ɔbaa bi a ne dzin dze Martha faa no kɔr ne fie."

column2: "Nna ɔwɔ onuabaa bi a wɔfrɛ no Mary
column3: ɔno so na ɔtsenaa Jesus anan ho na otsiee ne nsɛm."

column2: "Na Martha fonaa noho wɔ ɔsom pii ho

column5: ennhwɛ dɛ mo nua egyaa mo nko ma morosom? Dɛm ntsi se no dɛ ombosuo mo mu."

column2: "Na Ewuradze buae see no dɛ
column3: Martha
column5: edwendwen na ehaw woho wɔ ndzɛmba pii ho;"
